about_the_game:
Game Feature

·There is no fixed route tower defense, and the enemy will intelligently find the attacking route. Players need to adjust their formation accordingly;

·Diverse maps and strategies require a balance between water, land, and air;

·Several unique heroes can be chosen, each possessing powerful ultimate skills that can turn the tide in desperate situations;

·Several defense towers with different characteristics, including high towers, turrets, roadblocks, and traps, players can freely match to cope with different maps;

·Dozens of chips with different functions can transform your defense tower, giving it additional capabilities and greatly increasing the depth of strategy selection;

·Dozens of different enemies and several powerful bosses await your challenge on the journey;

·The unique gameplay "Evolution Mode" combines the challenge mode of rougelike elements, and players need to choose an evolution path from scratch during battles.

·Gorgeous music and skill effects make the player's combat experience more enjoyable.
